channel.title: Emails on Vanilla Forums Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Emails on Vanilla Forums Documentation

item.title: Emails
item.description: Email Appearance You can choose between sending plaintext or HTML emails. The difference is that HTML emails can include colors, images and other styling while plaintext emails are, well, plain text. HTML emails can be enabled or disabled from the dashboard by navigating to the ‘Email’ link in the panel. From there, you can also send test emails and configure HTML emails. HTML Emails You can customize the way your forum’s HTML emails look by navigating the ‘Email’ link in the dashboard’s panel.
